content.description: Myketa is a first-year college student who recently forgot to turn in three assignments. When she realized, Myketa complained to her roommate that professors never remind students about upcoming deadlines. She said that professors really want to make students fail their courses.
content.question: Which defense mechanism is most consistent with Myketaâ€™s behavior?

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
